original_text: And the Lord shall smite Egypt: he shall smite and heal it: and they shall return even to the Lord, and he shall be intreated of them, and shall heal them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 애굽을 치실지라도 치시고는 고치실 것이므로 그들이 여호와께로 돌아올 것이라 여호와께서 그들의 간구함을 들으시고 그들을 고쳐 주시리라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord shall smite Egypt
he shall smite and heal it
and they shall return even to the Lord
and he shall be intreated of them
